law.catch_line: Extent of recovery in contribution is the same at law as in equity.
law.text: The extent of recovery, in cases of contribution, shall be the same in a court of law that it is in a court of equity.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 484.
